tiles.description: You shouldn't be here. How did you do it? Actually just go back to the Valley.
This is the entrance to the town, spread out to the south. To the north is the valley.
Northwest corner of Town. To the north lies the test shop.
This is the north part of town. North of here is the entrance to the valley.
Northeast corner of Town. Various shops, both closed and open, line the street.
West side of Town. A large locked gate blocks the road westward. You're not sure what lies that way, but you can't find a way there anyway.

Before you stands a tall fountain. The faded and stained stone carries a certain aura that looms over you. It doesn't give off a vileness, however the mystery of how the water flows and why it has never stopped is ignored by the locals.
East side of Town. The path is open to the east, but something compells you to not go that way.
Southeast corner of Town. There seems to be a graveyard nearby. And this bothers you less than you feel it should.
South entrance of the Town. A path to the south is blocked by a fallen tree and you don't want to step over it.
Southwest corner of Town. A church resides to the south of here. You feel you might gain something in exchange for your experiences there.
North east shop for testing limited entrances. Can't buy much just yet. But you suspect you will be able to soon.
